headline: VILLA PRECISION INTERNATIONAL VPI FAST-2400S
description: Three Head Shapes Precision Glass Scriber. Windows NT Operating System.
specstable:
Manufacturer Villa Precision
Model FAST 2400S
Description Precision Shapes Scriber--Three Head
Other Information Specifications
  • Scribe Speed: Up to 1.0M/sec(rectilinear mode), Up to 200mm/sec (shapes mode)
  • Alignment Accuracy: ±0.076mm over 400mm substrate, (rectilinear mode), Up to ±0.127mm over 400mm substrate, (shapes mode)
  • Glass Substrate Size: 150mm-600mm x 650mm
  • Programming Capability: Fully programmable, Windows NT operating system. 100 steps in both X&Y, resolution: .01mm.
Condition Excellent
Year of Manufacture 2000
Power Requirements 100-240 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 73.000 in (185.4 cm)
Depth 42.000 in (106.7 cm)
Height 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Weight 1,657 lb (752 kg)
